title: XRay_Fluoroscopy
shortDescription: Real-time moving X-ray imaging for diagnostic or interventional procedures.

title: XRay_DR
shortDescription: Digital radiography capturing X-rays directly on a digital detector.

title: XRay_DEXA/DXA
shortDescription: Bone densitometry to measure bone mineral density.

title: XRay_CR
shortDescription: Computed Radiography using phosphor plates to capture X-rays.

title: Mammography
shortDescription: Low-dose X-ray imaging of breast tissue for screening.

title: Cephalometric Radiography
shortDescription: Specialized head/neck radiograph for orthodontic evaluation.

title: Standard MRI
shortDescription: General-purpose MRI for soft tissue contrast.

title: Functional MRI (fMRI)
shortDescription: Captures changes in blood oxygen to map brain activity.

title: Diffusion MRI (DWI/DTI)
shortDescription: Maps water diffusion in tissue for microstructure details.

title: Magnetic Resonance Angiography (MRA)
shortDescription: Visualizes blood vessels using MRI contrast or flow methods.

title: Magnetic Resonance Spectroscopy (MRS)
shortDescription: Analyzes metabolic composition of tissues by MRI.

title: Cardiac MRI (CMR)
shortDescription: Specialized MRI to assess heart structure and function.

title: Breast MRI
shortDescription: MRI protocol specifically for detailed breast imaging.

title: Whole-body MRI
shortDescription: Covers most of the body with MRI for screening or metastasis.

title: MR Enterography (MRE)
shortDescription: MRI protocol for small bowel imaging (e.g. Crohn's).

title: MR Myelography
shortDescription: Noninvasive imaging of the spinal subarachnoid space by MRI.

title: MR Urography
shortDescription: MRI-based evaluation of kidneys, ureters, and bladder.

title: Positron Emission Tomography (PET)
shortDescription: Functional imaging using radioactive tracers (e.g. FDG).

title: Single Photon Emission Computed Tomography (SPECT)
shortDescription: Functional imaging with gamma-emitting tracers in 3D.

title: Scintigraphy
shortDescription: 2D planar gamma imaging for various organs (thyroid, bone, etc.).

title: Gallium Scan
shortDescription: Uses gallium-67 for tumor/infection detection.

title: MIBG Scan
shortDescription: I-123 or I-131 MIBG for imaging neuroendocrine tumors.

title: Lymphoscintigraphy
shortDescription: Maps lymphatic drainage with gamma camera imaging.

title: B-mode (2D Ultrasound)
shortDescription: Basic grayscale ultrasound imaging in real-time.

title: Doppler Ultrasound
shortDescription: Measures blood flow velocity and direction via Doppler effect.

title: Contrast-enhanced Ultrasound (CEUS)
shortDescription: Uses microbubble contrast agents for vascular imaging.

title: Elastography
shortDescription: Ultrasound-based measurement of tissue stiffness.

title: 3D & 4D Ultrasound
shortDescription: Volumetric and real-time volumetric ultrasound imaging.

title: Transcranial Doppler (TCD)
shortDescription: Evaluates intracranial blood flow via ultrasound through temporal bone.

title: Intravascular Ultrasound (IVUS)
shortDescription: Ultrasound catheter imaging inside blood vessels.

title: Endoscopic Ultrasound (EUS)
shortDescription: Combines endoscopy and ultrasound for GI tract imaging.

title: Obstetric Ultrasound
shortDescription: Ultrasound specialized for fetal imaging during pregnancy.

title: Dental_OPG / Panoramic Radiography (OPG)
shortDescription: Panoramic X-ray of upper and lower jaws in one image.

title: Dental_CBCT / Cone Beam CT (CBCT)
shortDescription: Cone-beam CT scanning for 3D dental/maxillofacial imaging.

title: Dental_CR
shortDescription: Computed Radiography for dental imaging plates.

title: Laryngoscopy
shortDescription: Video-based inspection of the larynx.

title: Bronchoscopy
shortDescription: Endoscopic video of the airways.

title: Esophagogastroduodenoscopy (EGD)
shortDescription: Video endoscopic exam of esophagus, stomach, and duodenum.

title: Colonoscopy
shortDescription: Endoscopic video inspection of the colon.

title: Cystoscopy
shortDescription: Video-based inspection of the bladder via a cystoscope.

title: Hysteroscopy
shortDescription: Endoscopic viewing of the uterine cavity.

title: Ophthalmic Imaging
shortDescription: Video or photographic imaging of the eye (retina, anterior).

title: Confocal Microscopy
shortDescription: High-resolution optical imaging with increased depth selectivity.

title: Fluorescence Imaging
shortDescription: Uses fluorescent markers to visualize structures in real-time or photos.

title: Conventional CT
shortDescription: Standard computed tomography using rotating X-ray source.

title: High-resolution CT (HRCT)
shortDescription: Thin-slice CT typically for detailed lung imaging.

title: Low-dose CT (LDCT)
shortDescription: Reduced radiation-dose CT often for lung cancer screening.

title: CT Angiography (CTA)
shortDescription: Contrast-enhanced CT for vascular imaging of arteries and veins.

title: CT Perfusion (CTP)
shortDescription: Dynamic CT measuring tissue perfusion over time.

title: CT Colonography (Virtual Colonoscopy)
shortDescription: Noninvasive colon exam using CT scans and 3D reconstructions.

title: Dual-energy CT (DECT)
shortDescription: CT acquisition at two X-ray energy levels for material decomposition.

title: Cone Beam CT (CBCT)
shortDescription: Cone-shaped beam for 3D volumetric imaging, often in dental/ortho.

title: 4D CT
shortDescription: Captures motion over time for dynamic CT (respiratory, cardiac gating).

title: Genome Assembly
shortDescription: Combining short/long reads into a consensus genome.

title: Sequence Alignments
shortDescription: Aligning DNA/RNA reads to references or each other.

title: Annotations
shortDescription: Identifying genes, features, and functional elements in genomic data.

title: Variant Calls
shortDescription: SNP, Indel, and structural variant detection from sequence data.

title: Phylogenetic Analysis
shortDescription: Determining evolutionary relationships among organisms or sequences.

title: Sequence Data Formats (Raw and Processed Sequences)
shortDescription: Raw FASTQ and processed alignments or counts for transcriptomes.

title: Gene Expression Data Formats
shortDescription: Counts, FPKM, TPM data for expression profiling.

title: RNA-Seq Quantification and Analysis Formats
shortDescription: Outputs from SALMON, KALLISTO or other quantifiers.

title: Differential Expression and Statistical Analysis Formats
shortDescription: DESeq2, edgeR, limma results for differential expression.

title: Alternative Splicing and Transcript Assembly Formats
shortDescription: GTF/GFF for splicing isoforms, transcript assemblies.

title: Single-Cell RNA-Seq (scRNA-Seq) Data Formats
shortDescription: Cell-level expression data from droplet or plate-based scRNA-Seq.

title: Phylogenetic and Evolutionary Analysis Formats
shortDescription: Transcriptome-level evolutionary analysis with alignments, trees.

title: Transcriptome Assembly and Annotation Formats
shortDescription: Trinity outputs or GTF describing transcriptome builds.

title: Sequence Data Formats
shortDescription: Protein or peptide sequence files (FASTA, etc.).

title: Mass Spectrometry (MS) Data Formats
shortDescription: mzML, mzXML, vendor RAW for proteomics mass spectrometry.

title: Protein Structure Data Formats
shortDescription: 3D coordinates of proteins in PDB, mmCIF, etc.

title: Protein Interaction and Pathway Data Formats
shortDescription: BIOPAX, PSI-MI describing protein-protein interactions, pathways.

title: Annotation and Metadata Formats
shortDescription: UniProt, GO data describing protein function or metadata.
